messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re  Special Needs Children..
messages.msgSnippet: The lovely and talented Anne Ohman has let me put her article online so all of us can refer people to it for years to come! http://sandradodd.com/special/anne
messages.messageBody:
The lovely and talented Anne Ohman has let me put her article online so all
of us can refer people to it for years to come!


http://sandradodd.com/special/anne

It's linked to a page of comments from readers, to which we can add as time
goes on, AND there is a link to the special needs folder at unschooling.com.

Next project: Mary Gold's article from the November/December issue of HEM.
If that's not already online at the HEM site, Mary, can I put it up?
Can you send me a JPEG of the photo of Conor?

For anyone impatient to read a Mary Gold article in the meantime, look here:

http://sandradodd.com/games/nintendogold

Sandra
